description.zh-cn: 一部原创现代音乐剧，由张学友担任艺术总监及主演。分为粤语和国语两个版本，在亚洲多地巡演，是华人音乐剧历史上演出场次最多的音乐剧。
description.en: An original modern musical, with Jacky Cheung as the artistic director and lead actor. It has both Cantonese and Mandarin versions and has toured in multiple locations in Asia, becoming the most performed musical in the history of Chinese musical theatre.

description.en: A Hong Kong singer and actor, who served as the artistic director, producer, lead actor, lyricist, and composer for 'Snow.Wolf.Lake'.

description.zh-cn: 天星文化娱乐有限公司投资并主办了《雪狼湖》音乐剧。
description.en: Superstar Entertainment Ltd. invested in and produced the musical 'Snow.Wolf.Lake'.

description.zh-cn: 音乐剧《雪狼湖》的故事改编自钟伟民的原著小说。
description.en: The story of the musical 'Snow.Wolf.Lake' is adapted from the original novel by Chung Wai Man.

description.zh-cn: 钟伟民批评《雪狼湖》的宣传品上没有提及他的名字，认为制作方不尊重原作者。
description.en: Chung Wai Man criticized 'Snow.Wolf.Lake' for not mentioning his name in promotional materials, believing the producers disrespected the original author.

description.zh-cn: 陈淑芬担任《雪狼湖》的出品人。
description.en: Florence Chan served as the producer for 'Snow.Wolf.Lake'.

description.zh-cn: 《不老的传说》专辑在音乐剧公演前推出，收录了剧中主要歌曲，起到了宣传作用。
description.en: The album 'The Undying Legend' was released before the musical's premiere, featuring its main songs and serving a promotional role.

description.zh-cn: 宝丽金唱片公司发行了专辑《不老的传说》。
description.en: PolyGram released the album 'The Undying Legend'.

description.zh-cn: 花旗银行是《雪狼湖》音乐剧的主要赞助商。
description.en: Citibank was the main sponsor of the musical 'Snow.Wolf.Lake'.

description.zh-cn: 1996年《爱与交响曲》音乐会的成功，促使张学友开始转向更具艺术性质的表演，从而催生了音乐剧《雪狼湖》的创作想法。
description.en: The success of the 'Love & Symphony' concert in 1996 prompted Jacky Cheung to shift towards more artistic performances, leading to the creative idea for the musical 'Snow.Wolf.Lake'.

description.zh-cn: 张学友与香港管弦乐团合作演出了《爱与交响曲》音乐会。
description.en: Jacky Cheung performed in the 'Love & Symphony' concert in collaboration with the Hong Kong Philharmonic Orchestra.

description.zh-cn: 香港管弦乐团与张学友合作演出了《爱与交响曲》音乐会。
description.en: The Hong Kong Philharmonic Orchestra collaborated with Jacky Cheung for the 'Love & Symphony' concert.

description.zh-cn: 文本中提及张国荣是张学友的好友。

description.en: On the album 'The Undying Legend' (the Cantonese original soundtrack of 'Snow.Wolf.Lake'), Chan Kar Lo provided the singing voice for the character Ning Jingxue, replacing the stage actress.
